StatusBar.content: This button opens the menu. You can change settings there.
With these buttons you can start and stop the simulation of the game. Try to start the game.
With this button you open the sidebar which gives you an overview of everything that happened in the past.

Don't know how some part of
the game works? Click this
button to get more info.
These represent your current status in the game.

Factory.content: This is the factory, the place where all of your products are made.
You can order specific amounts of each product. Try to add a product.
Keep an eye on this info-box. It holds relevant information for the order you are placing.
If everything is satisfied you can place the order by clicking on the green button.

Warehouse.content: Here are your containers where you can store incoming products from the factory.
Here you can see the capacity that is used.
The colored circle around the product changes as the product perishes. When the product turns red, it will be removed from the warehouse within a few days.
You can purchase another container by clicking on this button.

Customers.content: This list displays the customers you can serve.

This is a single customer. You can send
him away if you don't want to serve him. Or click serve customer
to give the customer the products he wants. Of course
you need to have them in stock.

FactoryOrders.content: This is where you can see all orders currently in transport to your warehouse.
The order will arrive in the warehouse, when the progress bar is fully green. Do make sure you clicked the 'play' button in the statusbar.
